EmailTemplate.subject: Tracking the Right Conversion Metrics: Following up on the Retail Apps Report You Downloaded
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Because you recently downloaded our "2014 U.S. Retail Apps Report," I thought you might also be interested in this blog about the mobile conversion metrics that retailers should be - but aren't - tracking. Stay tuned for more great content from Pivotal Labs!
Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
Tracking the Right Smartphone Conversion Metrics <http://pivotallabs.com/tracking-right-smartphone-conversion-metrics>
You've probably seen first-hand that mobile usage has increased your website traffic, but has not necessarily corresponded to an increase in conversions. This is because traditional conversion metrics are not enabled to capture new types of consumer purchasing behaviors associated with mobile usage. Read about the metrics we think retailers should be tracking instead, which will enable you to better understand the role that mobile plays in driving conversions.
Click here to read the full blog <http://pivotallabs.com/tracking-right-smartphone-conversion-metrics>.
